backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling user profiles and network check result storage with access control and timestamped history retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping product features to associated frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference list providing short descriptive summaries for each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theme-aware CSS for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document bootstrapping the frontend with a mount point and script entry.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app shell containing theming, navigation tabs, header status display, footer, and integration of monitoring and auth components.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Login/logout button component managing Internet Identity authentication with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Dashboard UI displaying network status, metrics, and authentication prompts using cards and status indicators.
frontend/src/features/diagnostics/Diagno: Displays diagnostics UI with time‑window filtering, latency sparkline, and a table of recent connectivity checks.
frontend/src/features/diagnostics/Latenc: Renders a simple SVG line chart visualizing latency values over time, including grid lines and status-based point markers.
frontend/src/features/diagnostics/timeWi: Defines time‑window types and filters timestamped items based on the selected duration.
frontend/src/features/export/exportForma: Converts connectivity measurements into CSV or JSON string formats for exporting.
frontend/src/features/export/fileDownloa: Creates a downloadable file from provided content using a temporary object URL and link element.
frontend/src/features/export/ImportExpor: Provides UI controls to export connectivity samples to CSV/JSON and clear history if authenticated.
Defines React Query mutations for saving connectivity measurements and clearing stored network history.
frontend/src/features/history/networkHis: Maps measurements to backend NetworkCheckResult objects and converts them back to frontend measurements.
frontend/src/features/history/queries.ts: Fetches stored network history from the backend when the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/features/monitoring/connect: Performs a connectivity check via a lightweight HEAD request and returns latency or detailed error info.
frontend/src/features/monitoring/metrics: Computes latency averages, jitter, success rate, and derives a stability classification from samples.
frontend/src/features/monitoring/types.t: Defines types for connectivity measurements, derived metrics, and stability status.
frontend/src/features/monitoring/useConn: Continuously performs connectivity checks, maintains sample history, computes metrics, handles retries, and optionally saves results.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Displays a modal prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their name, using profile query and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/features/profile/queries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and save the caller's user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/settings/settingsS: Loads, validates, updates, and persists stabilization settings in localStorage via a custom hook.
frontend/src/features/settings/settingsT: Declares the StabilizationSettings interface, default values, and allowable bounds.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsV: UI for editing stabilization settings such as interval, timeout, and retry configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and updates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, logout, and identity loading.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing project state, features, and required images for a network stabilizer application.
